message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to spend a little less.  Would you be willing to go down to $90?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $105.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $105 is still a bit high for me. Would you consider $95?  I think that's a fair price that allows us both to walk away happy.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I think $95 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to compromise at $107.50
